welcomeMessage.name: Show welcome message again
welcomeMessage.hint: Activate to show the welcome message again on next reload.

arcanist2.name: Activate Arcanist Rework features
arcanist2.hint: Activates the 'Arcanum Rework' class feature type.

esper.name: Activate Esper features
esper.hint: Activates the 'Psychic Gift' class feature type.

mutant.name: Activate Mutant features
mutant.hint: Activates the 'Therioform' class feature type and the 'Associated Therioforms' section of the NPC sheet.

pilot.name: Activate Pilot features
pilot.hint: Activates the 'Vehicle', 'Armor Module', 'Weapon Module' and 'Support Module' class feature types, as well as the vehicle section of the Character sheet.

floralist.name: Activate Floralist features
floralist.hint: Activates the 'Magiseed' class feature type, the garden section of the Character sheet and Growth Clock integration for Misc. Abilities.

gourmet.name: Activate Gourmet features
gourmet.hint: Actives the 'Ingredient' and 'Cookbook' class feature types.

invoker.name: Activate Invoker features
invoker.hint: Activates the 'Invocations' class feature type and the Wellspring manager.

camping.name: Activate Camp Activities
camping.hint: Activates the 'Camp Activity' optional feature type.

welcomeMessage.thankYou: Thank you for using ProjectFU Playtest!
welcomeMessage.explanation: Since not every GM necessarily wants all classes to be available in their game, we added configuration options to enable/disable them. By default every class is disabled, which means if you want to use any of them you have to enable them in the settings first.
welcomeMessage.warning: Please use caution when disabling a class again, because items that refer to those features will become invalid and vanish. Both your browser console and the Foundry 'Support & Issues' dialog will show you errors. This is expected behaviour. To get rid of the errors you need to make sure no items use the class features you want to disable.

growthClock.notFound: No Growth Clock found. Please mark a Misc Ability with a clock as both a favorite and as dedicated Growth Clock.
growthClock.invalid: Filled Growth Clock sections do not correspond to an effect.

cooking.title: Cooking
cooking.unknownEffect: Unknown Effect! Get cooking to discover which effect this combination provides!
cooking.unknownEffectChat: Unknown Effect! Generate it using the Delicacy Effect table and don't forget to save it in your cookbook.

manager.title: Active Wellsprings
manager.clearTooltip: Shift + Click to clear active wellsprings.

app.title: Class Feature Migration
app.explanation: The supplements containing one or more of your enabled class features have been released internationally. The affected class features have been moved to the base ProjectFU system, since they are not in playtest any more and widely available now. To minimize confusion we ask you to migrate your affected class features. We don't expect you to suffer data loss during migration but the longer you postpone the migration the more likely it is. Once the migration is complete the affected class features will be automatically disabled and the page will reload.
app.affectedFeatures: The following features will be migrated
app.affectedCompendiums: Items or Actors in the following compendium packs will be affected by the migration
app.compendiumsWarning: Compendium packs need to be unlocked for migrations to work. Please unlock all affected compendium packs before starting the migration process. Locked compendiums affected by these migrations *WILL* suffer data loss.
